<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="">!!!sys_id_1819!!!</macroponent><name>Discontinue item</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function script({api, event}) {  
api.data.gform.setValue({
fieldName: 'inventory_status',
value: 'discontinued'
});
api.data.gform.save();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>!!!sys_id_1929!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
